subject: RE: Request for additional information
body:
Dear Jane,

Thank you for your recent correspondence regarding our Statement of Compliance submission.

We have prepared the additional documentation you requested in your previous message. The updated evidence files have been compiled and are ready for your review.

Please let us know if you require any further information or clarification on any aspect of our submission.

Best regards,
Assessment Partners UK

subject: Request for additional information
body:
Dear Assessment Partners UK,

Thank you for your Statement of Compliance submission received on 2nd June 2025.

Following our initial review, we require some additional information to complete our assessment:

1. Updated evidence of your quality assurance procedures
2. Details of any changes to your assessment methodology since your last submission
3. Confirmation of current assessor qualifications

Please provide this information within 10 working days.

Kind regards,
Jane Lee
Case Lead

subject: RE: Submission received - OFQ-1001
body:
Dear Jane,

Thank you for confirming receipt of our Statement of Compliance submission.

We appreciate your team's prompt response and look forward to working with you throughout the review process.

If you need any clarification or additional information, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
Assessment Partners UK

subject: Submission received - OFQ-1001
body:
Dear Assessment Partners UK,

This is to confirm we have received your Statement of Compliance submission on 2nd June 2025.

Your case reference is OFQ-1001.

We will review your submission and contact you if we require any additional information. You can expect an initial response within 15 working days.

You can track the progress of your case through your online portal.

Kind regards,
Jane Lee
Case Lead

subject: Follow-up on complaint - OFQ-1002
body:
Dear Michael,

I wanted to follow up on my complaint submitted on 15th June regarding the assessment irregularities.

Have there been any developments in the investigation? I have not received an update in over two weeks.

I remain available to provide any additional information that may assist with your review.

Kind regards,
Emily Carter

subject: RE: Complaint acknowledgement - OFQ-1002
body:
Dear Ms Carter,

Thank you for your complaint regarding assessment irregularities.

We are currently reviewing the information you provided and may need to contact you for additional details during our investigation.

You can expect an update within 20 working days of receipt of your complaint.

Kind regards,
Michael Torres
Case Lead

subject: Response to information request - OFQ-1003
body:
Dear Sarah,

Please find attached our response to your information request dated 1st July 2025.

We have included all the requested documentation:
- Current assessor list with qualifications
- Quality assurance procedures documentation
- Sample assessment materials
- Centre approval certificates

Please let us know if you need any clarification on the materials provided.

Best regards,
TechCert Solutions

subject: Application for recognition - next steps
body:
Dear Assessment Excellence Ltd,

Thank you for your application for recognition as an awarding organisation.

We have completed our initial review and would like to schedule a site visit to your premises as part of the assessment process.

Please provide three available dates within the next four weeks when your team would be available for a full-day site assessment.

Kind regards,
David Chen
Case Lead
